name: Banana Bread
steps: Preheat oven to 350ÂºF. Grease a 9x5-inch loaf pan (or 12-cup muffin pan) with butter, or spray with non stick cooking spray.
In a large bowl mash bananas until smooth. Mix in oil, vanilla, and sugar.
In another bowl lightly mix baking soda and baking powder with flour. Mix into banana mixture and stir until combined. Fold in chocolate chips.
Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake for 50-60 minutes (25 minutes for muffins), or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
